#summary The home page of the LX-10 wiki

= Introduction =

Thanks for trying out our new language simulator. Please email Mark with any name ideas for the language.


= Language =

== Comment ==

{{{
@ <anything you want>
}}}

== Assignment == 

{{{
set <variable name> to/= <number>
	set <variable name> to/= <variable name>
	set <variable name> to/= <calculation>
	set <variable name> to/= <coordinate>
}}}

== Increment/Decrement == 

{{{
add <number> to <number variable>
	take <number> from <number variable>
}}}
